SELECT o.*, p.id projectId, p.name projectName, v.id verId, v.name verName
FROM TstPlan o
JOIN TstProject p ON o.projectId=p.id LEFT JOIN TstVer v ON o.verId=v.id
WHERE o.projectId=#{projectId} AND o.deleted != true AND o.disabled != true ORDER BY o.createTime DESC

SELECT o.*, p.name projectName, v.name verName FROM TstPlan o JOIN TstProject p ON o.projectId=p.id LEFT JOIN TstVer v ON o.verId=v.id
WHERE p.parentId=#{projectId} AND o.deleted != true AND o.disabled != true ORDER BY o.createTime DESC

SELECT o.*, p.name projectName, v.name verName FROM TstPlan o JOIN TstProject p ON o.projectId=p.id LEFT JOIN TstVer v ON o.verId=v.id
WHERE p.orgId=#{orgId} AND o.deleted != true AND o.disabled != true ORDER BY o.createTime DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE TstPlan o SET o.status = 'in_progress' WHERE o.id=#{id} AND o.status != 'in_progress'
